remarks: Elementhood in the set of eventually bounded functions.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 21-Sep-2014.)  (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 26-May-2016.)
statement:
elo1mpt.1 $e |- ( ph -> A C_ RR ) $.
elo1mpt.2 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. A ) -> B e. CC ) $.
elo1mpt $p |- ( ph -> ( ( x e. A |-> B ) e. O(1) <-> E. y e. RR E. m e. RR A. x e. A ( y <_ x -> ( abs ` B ) <_ m ) ) ) $.
$d A m x y $.
$d B m y $.
$d m ph x y $.
